meanings.definition: A fleet of small ships or boats.
meanings.sent1: The flotilla of sailboats raced across the lake.
meanings.sent2: The flotilla of canoes paddled together in unison.
meanings.sent3: The flotilla of rubber ducks in the bathtub made bath time fun.
meanings.sent4: The flotilla of clouds drifted lazily in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The flotilla of colorful paper boats floated gracefully in the pond.

meanings.definition: A group of small naval vessels.
meanings.sent1: The flotilla of warships patrolled the coastline.
meanings.sent2: The flotilla of submarines dove deep into the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The flotilla of toy boats in the pool had a mini naval battle.
meanings.sent4: The flotilla of fishing boats returned with a bountiful catch.
meanings.sent5: The flotilla of navy ships sailed in formation during the parade.
